company.name: JLB Constructions
company.description: Professional construction company specializing in residential and renovation projects with over 20 years of experience.
company.address: Plot No. CS2,11th Street Annai Therasa nagar, Puzhuthivakkam

projects.title: Modern Office Complex
projects.description: A state-of-the-art commercial building featuring sustainable design, energy-efficient systems, and modern amenities. This project showcases contemporary commercial construction excellence with LEED certification.
projects.longDescription: Located in the heart of downtown, this modern office complex was designed to provide a sustainable and productive work environment. The building features state-of-the-art HVAC systems, skylights for natural lighting, and outdoor green spaces for employee wellness.

images.name: exterior-front.jpg
images.caption: Exterior front view of the completed building

images.name: lobby.jpg
images.caption: Modern lobby entrance with natural lighting

projects.title: Residential Apartment Block
projects.description: Luxury residential complex with 200+ units featuring modern amenities, community spaces, and premium finishes. This project represents the pinnacle of residential construction excellence.
projects.longDescription: This prestigious residential complex offers 200+ units of luxury living space with world-class amenities including a fitness center, rooftop garden, and community lounge.

images.name: exterior-day.jpg
images.caption: Exterior view of the residential complex

projects.title: Heritage Home Renovation
projects.description: Complete interior and exterior renovation of a heritage property, preserving architectural character while adding modern features and systems.
projects.longDescription: This heritage home required careful restoration of original architectural elements while incorporating modern conveniences and updated systems.

projects.title: Commercial Warehouse
projects.description: Industrial warehouse complex designed for logistics and storage operations with modern facilities and security systems.

services.title: Residential Construction
services.description: Custom home building and residential projects tailored to your needs

services.title: Commercial Construction
services.description: Professional commercial projects for businesses and organizations

services.title: Renovation & Remodeling
services.description: Transform your existing space with professional renovation services

services.title: Sustainable Building

heroContent.subheading: Transform your vision into reality with our expert construction services. From concept to completion, we deliver excellence in every project.
